subject: Re: Paypal PayFlow Payment Gateway Issues
preview: Hi Jamie, Confirming we have tidied this up now and have backups of the previous versions in case we need them.

full_threads.body:
Hi Jamie, 

Confirming we have tidied this up now and have backups of the previous versions in case we need them.

Hi Heath,

That's okay. I wasn't sure how long you would be keeping them for but it all makes sense.


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie,

We will clean them out shortly. It was only precautionary as we are not 100% comfortable with the hosting setup and the fact that they are mainly related to WooCommerce. Given the problems we have had with the check out on that site, we are trying to be as careful as possible. More than usual! 

But leave it with us, we will have it tidied up by the end of this week.

Hi Heath,

I understand we're leaving the old plugins on the server but the way they've been left is a little untidy for my liking.

And because they have been left in the main plugin folder, WordPress is presenting doubles and is still flagging them as requiring updates. It makes it difficult to distinguish what's active, update to date etc.

See screenshots attached and you'll see what I mean.

Is there a better way to archive these plugins?

Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Awesome, thanks :)


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie, 

Just confirming the balance of the updates have been made. Please note, as we don't host this install, we leave a copy of the old plugins on the site (but not active) in case there are any unforeseen issues on this server in particular. We do test them on our staging install first of course.

Thanks for the update!


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie, 

We focussed on the WooCommerce updates and plan to run the other updates this evening outside of hours. We will keep you updated.

Hi Heath,

Did we manage to get the Nuplas updates complete?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Thanks. Positive news so far, we had a successful Payflow transition last night :)


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie,

Yes it was a test one. We created a digital product to skip shipping and to be able to use a decimal and to test out the new configuration, and to not affect the inventory sync.

No need for a refund it’s probably more trouble than it’s worth. I just wanted to make sure it was definitely working in real world testing.

Hi Heath,

Was this a real transaction? I'll get Nuplas to cancel and refund the order.





Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek
Thanks Heath!

Hi Heath,

I'm looking in the Nuplas network admin at the plugins and can see there are pending updates. Do you know when these will be updated? I thought that was scheduled for today. I know you probably had to drop a few things to help me with PAPA so all good 😀

Can you let me know the you think these will be applied as I need to test the inventory sync asap.


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Heath,

Thanks! I'm glad out was as simple as a plugin big fix update and not a custom work around. You've no idea how many hours I spent trying to work that one out! We'll keep an eye on it.

Thanks for the great support!


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hey Jamie, 

It's now working on the live site too! We just did a successful test - order #8432.

Looks like it was the password issue in the end.

Hi Heath,

We've reset the PayPal Manager password and I've tested the Payflow checkout on staging in sandbox mode and it appears to be working (with the out dated plugin).

I've updated the password on production now too. Can you have another crack and let me know if you get the same error?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek
@joel ok awesome thanks!!

Hey @heath , I have update some of the plugins including this one and we could try it in the morning.

http://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/shop/
Awesome, thanks Jamie and yes, fingers crossed! You guys are scheduled first up tomorrow 👍🏼.

Hi Heath,

Great news! Hopefully it is as simple as that. I had given up!

I've downloaded and attached the updated plugin.

Let me know how you get on.
Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hey Jamie, 

I think we have some great news on this! 

We discovered that the plugin being used for PayFlow, "WooCommerce PayPal Pro (Classic and PayFlow Editions) Gateway" has been updated couple of times since this issue was first presented to us. In the change log it specifically mentions a fix for a rounding error. 

So, do you have an active licence for this plugin? And if so can you please download the latest version and send a zip file to us? We will then test it on staging.
@joel Can we chat about this one today? Cheers
